channel.title: How to change Client ip to my ip

item.title: How to change Client ip to my ip
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Biosoft Mr_Biosoft
item.description:
@Mr_Biosoft wrote:

In the client folder edit the EGUI.java fiel for example heres the basic galkon clients EGUI.Java

[code]import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Cursor;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;

public class EGUI
{

public EGUI()
{
}

public static void main(String args[])
{
    client.main(new String[] {
        "", "", ""
    });
}

}[/code]

Heres where your ip goes

client.main(new String[] { "", "", ""

in between all three quotes

so it should look like so

client.main(new String[] { "my ip", "my ip", "my ip"

Read full topic
